notifications_dismiss_all_confirm: You want to dismiss all notifications?
notifications_store_reward_details: You received a gift from Riot Games!
clubs_invite_accept: {{summonerName}} wants you to join up with {{clubName}}
club_promote_member_success_body: You successfully promoted {{summonerName}} in the club {{clubName}} from a member to an officer.
club_demote_member_success_body: You successfully demoted {{summonerName}} in the club {{clubName}} from an officer to a member.
clubs_removed: You have been removed from the club {{clubName}}.
clubs_player_nominated: {{summonerName}} has been nominated to the club {{clubName}}
clubs_kick_player: You have successfully removed {{summonerName}} from the club {{clubName}}.
clubs_promote_player: {{summonerName}} has been promoted to {{roleName}} in the club {{clubName}}
clubs_promote_you: You have been promoted to {{roleName}} in the club {{clubName}}
clubs_demote_player: {{summonerName}} has been demoted to {{roleName}} in the club {{clubName}}
clubs_demote_you: You have been demoted to {{roleName}} in the club {{clubName}}
clubs_transfer_ownership: Ownership of the club {{clubName}} has been transferred to {{summonerName}}.
clubs_transfer_ownership_you: Ownership of the club {{clubName}} has been transferred to you.
clubs_new_invite: {{summonerName}} has invited you to the club {{clubName}}
loot_adventure_arcade_first_event_notifi: Play missions and earn rewards during Arcade Boss World | {{startDate}} - {{endDate}}
loot_adventure_arcade_second_event_notif: Arcade Boss World ends soon. Complete missions before time’s up on {{endDate}}!
loot_adventure_arcade_third_event_notifi: Arcade Boss World has ended. Redeem your tickets before they disappear on {{redeemDate}}. Thanks for playing!
new_mission_details: {{mission_title}} has been added to your missions.
player_behavior_chat_restriction_notific: Because of unsportsmanlike conduct, your in-game chat is being limited. Once you've completed the required number of games, the restriction will go away.
You completed your chat restriction. Keep it sportsmanlike from here on out!
leaver_buster_punishment_body_plural: Because you either left or AFK'd during a game, you're being placed in low priority queues for {{gamesRemaining}} matchmade games.
leaver_buster_punishment_body_singular: Because you either left or AFK'd during a game, you're being placed in low priority queues for {{gamesRemaining}} matchmade game.
leaver_buster_reforming_body: You've been leaving or AFKing in fewer games recently, and your account status has improved. Thanks for making an effort to be a better teammate.
clash_notification_title_QUEUE_DODGE: A Player has Exited the Match
clash_notification_description_DISMISS: Your Clash team has disbanded. All tickets have been refunded.
clash_notification_description_SUGGESTIO: A player has been suggested to your team.
clash_notification_description_ACCEPT_IN: {{sourcePlayer}} accepted your invite and is locking in.
clash_notification_description_DECLINE_I: {{sourcePlayer}} has declined to join your team.
clash_notification_description_CAPTAIN_L: The captain of your Clash team has left. A new captain has been picked.
The captain of your Clash team has left. You have been promoted to Captain.
clash_notification_description_ACCEPT_SU: The team captain has sent an invite to your suggested player.
clash_notification_description_DECLINE_S: The team captain declined your invite suggestion.
clash_notification_description_ACCEPT_TI: {{sourcePlayer}} has accepted your offer of a ticket for this tournament.
clash_notification_description_DECLINE_T: {{sourcePlayer}} has declined your offer of a ticket for this tournament.
clash_notification_description_ROSTER_AC: {{sourcePlayer}} has accepted your offer of a ticket for this tournament.
clash_notification_description_ROSTER_DE: {{sourcePlayer}} has declined your offer of a ticket for this tournament.
clash_notification_description_OWNER_CLO: The captain disbanded the team. All tickets have been refunded.
clash_notification_description_KICK_SELF: The captain has removed you from the team.
clash_notification_description_KICK: The captain has removed {{sourcePlayer}} from the team.
clash_notification_description_INVITE: You're invited to join {{rosterName}} for Clash.
clash_notification_description_RESENT_IN: You're invited to join {{rosterName}} for Clash.
clash_notification_description_REGISTERE: Your team is registered for Clash!
clash_notification_description_PHASE_CHE: Your Clash team is locked in.
clash_notification_description_QUEUE_DOD: A player has dodged champion select or did not show for your match. Your match has been completed.
clash_notification_description_BYE_AUTO_: Congratulations! Your team has completed a match.
clash_notification_description_RESTRICTI: Congratulations! Your team has completed a match.
clash_notification_description_GAME_COMP: Your team has completed a Clash match!
clash_notification_description_WITHDRAW_: Your team has been removed from the bracket. You'll receive any prizes earned up until this point.
The opposing team has forfeited and withdrawn from Clash.
clash_notification_description_ROUND_COM: The current round has been completed.
clash_notification_description_SUB_INVIT: You have been invited to substitute on a Clash team for the upcoming phase.
Your team has chosen a substitute for you. You may still reclaim your spot.
clash_notification_description_SUB_ACCEP: {{sourcePlayer}} has accepted the invite to substitute for the upcoming phase.
clash_notification_description_SUB_DECLI: {{sourcePlayer}} has declined the invite to substitute for the upcoming phase.
clash_notification_description_SUB_RECLA: The substituted player has returned to the Clash roster. You have been removed.
clash_notification_description_SUB_REVOK: Your subsitute position has been revoked by the team captain.
clash_notification_description_MEMBER_SU: {{sourcePlayer}} is subbing for another team. You’ll need to find a sub to compete.
clash_notification_description_REWARD_GR: Due to an error with Clash, we could not deliver your rewards. We’ll be trying again shortly!
Clash rewards delivered! Check your Profile and Loot to see what you got!
clash_notification_description_GAME_STAR: Your Clash match could not be started because a summoner could not be reached. Retrying in {{retrySeconds}} seconds.
We were unable to reach a summoner. Your Clash match has been completed.
clash_notification_title_BRACKET_STATUS_: Next Match Coming Up. Scouting is Open.
clash_notification_description_BRACKET_S: Congratulations! Come back on the next day for a bigger bracket and fight for another Trophy!
You're eliminated from this bracket. Buy back in for a shot at cool prizes!
Clash has ended. Check the Clash Hub for upcoming events!
You've lost the bracket. Keep playing for more prizes.
The next round starts soon. Scout your opponents!
You have a free win! You have no opponent for the current match.
clash_notification_description_BRACKET_R: You've been placed into a bracket. Scout your opponents now!
clash_notification_description_UPDATE_PH: The schedule for Clash has been updated! See the Clash page for more information.
clash_notification_description_CR_TOURNA: Head to the Clash tab and form your team!
The Clash tournament starts soon. Head to the Clash tab to Lock In!
ranked_notification_eos_last_day_of_seas: Last day of the ranked season is November 12
ranked_notification_eos_BRONZE: Congrats on completing the Ranked season! Here are your rewards!
ranked_notification_eos_SILVER: Congrats on completing the Ranked season! Keep climbing, we believe.
ranked_notification_eos_GOLD: You are victorious! Congratulations on finishing in Gold.
ranked_notification_eos_PLATINUM: Congratulations! You’re in the top 11.3% of League players.
ranked_notification_eos_DIAMOND: Few can call themselves Diamond players. Specifically, only 0.6% can. Congratulations on completing the Ranked season.
ranked_notification_eos_MASTER: Congratulations! You’ve completed this Ranked season at the highest levels of competitive play.
ranked_notification_eos_CHALLENGER: Congratulations! You’ve completed this Ranked season at the highest levels of competitive play.
merch_notification_space_odyssey_2018_co: Go to the merch website by 10/08/18 to pre-order the Morning Star Crew Jacket!
